text: 28:56-57 2 Atriviba 6:28-29; Azir Akam 4:10Apaniba nguibam bar anekɨarughtɨ, amizir aghuir ziaba ikia ian tongɨn dagɨaba ikia dabirabir aghuibagh apiaghiri gumaziba me aneteragharuiba, me dughiar kamɨn, damamin dagheba bar puvatɨgham. Kamaghɨn, a uan borir otibav sogh, dar mɨtariba sara dar amam. Egh a uan par a bar ifongeziba ko, borir igharazir ikiavɨra itiba, me gitagh ramegham. A kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgham, a dagheba bar puvatɨ, ezɨ ua tuaviba puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a modogh uan borir iririvim amegham.
